languages.text: {n}Немезит прижался к земле, зажимая кровоточащую рану под ребрами. Его истерзанное тело еще не покинули силы, и все в его фигуре выражает готовность продолжать драться. Красный платок больше не закрывает его лица, и мститель с издевкой скалится окровавленными зубами.{/n} "Слабо. Я пока не впечатлен".

{n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."
languages.original_text: {n}Немезит прижался к земле, зажимая кровоточащую рану под ребрами. Его истерзанное тело еще не покинули силы, и все в его фигуре выражает готовность продолжать драться. Красный платок больше не закрывает его лица, и мститель с издевкой скалится окровавленными зубами.{/n} "Слабо. Я пока не впечатлен".

I have yet to be impressed."

{n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a willingness to keep fighting. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante is grinning at you with bloody teeth.{/n} "Weak. I could do this all day."

languages.text: {n}Nemesit kauert am Boden und umklammert die blutende Wunde unter seinen Rippen. Sein gepeinigter Körper ist immer noch stark, und seine ganze Haltung verrät den Willen, weiterzukämpfen. Der rote Schal bedeckt nicht mehr sein Gesicht, und der Rächer grinst dich mit blutigen Zähnen an.{/n} "Schwach. Ich bin immer noch nicht beeindruckt."
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesit kauert am Boden und umklammert die blutende Wunde unter seinen Rippen. Sein gepeinigter Körper ist immer noch stark, und seine ganze Haltung verrät den Willen, weiterzukämpfen. Der rote Schal bedeckt nicht mehr sein Gesicht, und der Rächer grinst dich mit blutigen Zähnen an.{/n} "Schwach. Ich bin immer noch nicht beeindruckt."

languages.text: {n}Nemesitio está de rodillas en el suelo, llevándose las manos a la herida sangrante bajo sus costillas. Su cuerpo torturado aún es fuerte, y su postura indica su voluntad a seguir luchando. La bufanda roja ya no cubre su rostro, y el justiciero te dedica una sonrisa ensangrentada.{/n} «Débil. Todavía no has logrado impresionarme».
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."

Su cuerpo torturado aún es fuerte, y su postura indica su voluntad a seguir luchando. La bufanda roja ya no cubre su rostro, y el justiciero te dedica una sonrisa ensangrentada.{/n} «Débil. Todavía no has logrado impresionarme».

languages.text: {n}ネメサイトは地面にうずくまり、肋骨の下から血を流す傷口をギュッと抑えた。拷問を受けた体はまだ強く、その姿勢の何もかも戦い続ける意志があることを表している。赤いスカーフは、もはや顔を覆っておらず、自警団の彼は血まみれの歯でにやりと笑った。{/n}「弱い。感動しないな」
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."

traits.locale_text: {n}ネメサイトは地面にうずくまり、肋骨の下から血を流す傷口をギュッと抑えた。拷問を受けた体はまだ強く、その姿勢の何もかも戦い続ける意志があることを表している。赤いスカーフは、もはや顔を覆っておらず、自警団の彼は血まみれの歯でにやりと笑った。{/n}「弱い。感動しないな」

languages.text: {n}涅墨斯特蹲在地上，用力捂着肋骨下方流血的伤口。他饱受摧残的身体依然很健壮，他的姿势也表达了他继续战斗的意志。他的红色头巾已经不见了，他对你露出了沾满鲜血的牙齿，笑了起来。{/n}“太弱了，这真是太让人失望了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."

traits.locale_text: {n}涅墨斯特蹲在地上，用力捂着肋骨下方流血的伤口。他饱受摧残的身体依然很健壮，他的姿势也表达了他继续战斗的意志。他的红色头巾已经不见了，他对你露出了沾满鲜血的牙齿，笑了起来。{/n}“太弱了，这真是太让人失望了。”

languages.text: {n}Némésite s'est accroupi en serrant ses côtes d'où s'écoule un filet de sang. Son corps meurtri n'a cependant rien perdu de sa force et tout dans sa posture suggère qu'il a l'intention de continuer à se battre. Le justicier vous lance un sourire ensanglanté que ne dissimule plus le foulard rouge qui couvrait jusqu'ici son visage.{/n} « Vous êtes faible. Il en faut plus que ça pour m'impressionner. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."

Le justicier vous lance un sourire ensanglanté que ne dissimule plus le foulard rouge qui couvrait jusqu'ici son visage.{/n} « Vous êtes faible. Il en faut plus que ça pour m'impressionner. »

languages.text: {n}Nemezit, kaburga kemiklerinin altındaki kanayan yarasını kavrayarak zeminde çömeliyor. İşkence gören bedeninin gücü hâlâ yerinde. Duruşunun her hâlinden dövüşmeye niyetli olduğu anlaşılıyor. Kırmızı atkı, artık yüzünü kaplamıyor. Sözüm ona düzenin koruyucusu, kan içinde kalmış dişleriyle sana bakarak sırıtıyor.{/n} "Zayıfsın. Henüz beni etkilemeyi başaramadın."
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite is crouching on the ground, clutching at the bleeding wound under his ribs. His tortured body is still strong, and everything in his posture expresses a will to fight on. The red scarf no longer covers his face, and the vigilante grins at you with bloodied teeth.{/n} "Weak. I have yet to be impressed."
